original: intros. split. - intros H. unfold Rbar_lt, Rbar_mult_pos in *. destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. + apply Rbar_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos (Finite r) z); auto. + apply Rbar_not_lt_le in H as Hnot. apply Rbar_le_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos p_infty z); auto. + apply Rbar_not_lt_le in H as Hnot. apply Rbar_le_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos m_infty z); auto. - intros H. unfold Rbar_lt, Rbar_mult_pos in *. destruct x, y; simpl in *; try contradiction. + apply Rbar_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos (Finite r) z); auto. + apply Rbar_not_lt_le in H as Hnot. apply Rbar_le_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos p_infty z); auto. + apply Rbar_not_lt_le in H as Hnot. apply Rbar_le_lt_trans with (Rbar_mult_pos m_infty z); auto.
